column5: Our lakehouse is amazing for business retreats, family reunions, and couples retreats! The backyard is huge and perfect for outdoor games by the lake! There are multiple seating areas, dining rooms, and a massive kitchen with a 16' island to gather around in the mornings. 3 King, 3 Full, and 2 Twin beds all with Tempurpedic mattresses.  Enjoy coffee & wine on the balcony, or fishing off of the private dock. The property is over 2 acres large, very quiet, and has a private gated entry.
